price: Àti pé dájúdájú àwọn ọkùnrin kan nínú ènìyàn máa ń fi àwọn ọkùnrin kan nínú àwọn àlùjànnú wá ààbò. Àwọn àlùjànnú sì ṣe àlékún aburú fún wọn.
arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ كَانَ رِجَالٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡإِنسِ يَعُوذُونَ بِرِجَالٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ فَزَادُوهُمۡ رَهَقٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-annahu kāna rijālun mina al-insi yaʿūdhūna birijālin mina al-jini fazādūhum rahaqan
